titles.title: Child Tax Credit Integrity Preservation Act of 2017
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify eligibility for the child tax credit.
Child Tax Credit Integrity Preservation Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Child Tax Credit Integrity Preservation Act of 2017
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the identification requirement for the child tax credit to require taxpayers to provide a valid identification number (i.e., a Social Security account number issued by the Social Security Administration) on their tax returns in addition to the name and identification number of each qualifying child.
